repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:trusty
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

MAINTAINER Larry Cai <larry.caiyu@gmail.com>

ENV REFREST_AT 20150115

# nginx
RUN apt-get update -q \
    && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yf build-essential python-software-properties software-properties-common \
    && add-apt-repository ppa:nginx/stable \
    && apt-get update -q \
    && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install -y curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ENV NGINX_VERSION 1.7.9
# build nginx from source with http auth module enabled
RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install libpcre3-dev zlib1g-dev libssl-dev bsdtar libldap2-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# use bsdtar for zip file
RUN curl -f -Ls https://github.com/kvspb/nginx-auth-ldap/archive/master.zip | bsdtar -xf- -C /tmp \
    && curl -f -s https://nginx.org/download/nginx-${NGINX_VERSION}.tar.gz | tar -xz -C /tmp \
	&& cd /tmp/nginx-${NGINX_VERSION} \
	&& ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" --add-module=../nginx-auth-ldap-master --with-http_ssl_module --with-http_auth_request_module && make && make install

# put self signed ssl key (generated by htpasswd
RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install apache2-utils && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD . /app
RUN chmod +x /app/start.sh && mkdir /data

VOLUME ["/data"]

EXPOSE 80 443 3443
CMD /app/start.sh
